form.PN:
pri 1. in 2. pomenu besedo izgovarjamo
/j*u*:st/
, pri 3. in 4. pa
/j*u*:zd/
.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
used to be done
ali
used to be the case
, se je v preteklosti redno dogajalo.

seg.quote: They used to send me a card at Christmas time.
I used to be very mean.

sense.def:
To be used to something
pomeni, da nekaj poznamo, ker smo tisto že velikokrat naredili ali videli.
To get used to something
pomeni, da nekaj postopoma spoznavamo.

seg.quote: San Diego was not used to such demonstrations.
We are used to working together.
After a few days, I got used to it all.

sense.def:
Robec, brisača ali kozarec, ki je
used
, je umazan, ker ga je nekdo že uporabil.

Avto, ki je
used
, ni nov, ampak je že imel lastnika.
